name: AimTrainer (itch) (Anppuuu)
description:
2D Aim Trainer |  Basic main menu with play and quit button, once play button is pressed you get to a new scene with countdown timer from 3 to 1 and then circle spawns to random position on screen. You have to click the circle as close as you can to the middle to earn most points. 3 points for outer ring, 10 for middle circle and 5 for the ring between them. If you miss you lose 2 points.

500 score maximum (top left bar.) 50 circles to spawn (top right bar.) After all the circles have been clicked or missed, you will be shown your time, score from the run, highscore from previous runs and your hit percentance from the run.

For now the game only runs 1920 x 1080 windowed. Maybe I will update it later for different resolutions and fullscreen option as well.

This is my first game I've published. Project was originally for learning purposes for school but I decided to publish it.
